charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Hop had plans to
meet up with Leon for some training.
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_0301_0200_: Think he’s gonna get here on time?
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_0401_0400_: Well, Charizard’s with him, so he should be fine!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_0302_0500_: Can Leon make it on his own?
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_0402_0600_: He’ll be fine—he’s got Charizard with him!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_0700_:
Lee always does what he says he’ll do, so I’m
sure he’ll be here any minute!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_1100_: Haha! Sorry. But at least I made it in time, right?
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_1200_: Oh, Lee. What are you like...
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_1300_: You’d never get anywhere without Charizard!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_1400_: True! My navigation skills are total rubbish!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_1500_: That’s not something to be proud of!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_1600_:
Good thing Lee’s got Charizard as his partner...
Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_0401_1800_: You took the words out of my mouth!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_0302_1900_: It must be a relief for you too, Hop.
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_0402_2000_:
Yeah, knowing Charizard is around to help is a
huge weight off my mind...
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2100_: Thanks for always looking after Lee, Charizard!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2200_:
Charizard doesn’t just show me which way to
go—he also shows me the path to victory!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2300_:
Whenever I’m in a pinch in battle, Charizard
always helps me find a way out of it.
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2400_: I made it where I am today thanks to Charizard!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2500_:
And now, he’s guided me to a new adventure...
An arc suit adventure!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2600_: Wow, Lee! You and Charizard are the coolest!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2700_:
You better show us some super-exciting battles
with your arc suit!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_2800_: Of course! Leave it to me!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_3000_:
After we’ve replenished our energy! Who’s up for
a bite to eat?
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_3100_: I could eat, but...are you picking the place, Lee?
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_3200_:
I wanna eat something extra tasty, since
[Name:PlayerNickname ] is here with us.
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_3300_:
You got it, mate! I’ll take you all to the most
popular restaurant on Pasio. Follow me!
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_3400_: Huh? Is that the wrong way?
charaepi_ch0247_90_dande/2301_1201_3500_: All right, Charizard, I’m leaving navigation to you!
